verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, to the saints <S%G40><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hath blessed <S%G2127><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

even as <S%G2531><s%> he chose <S%G1586><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, that we <S%G2248><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%>:

having foreordained <S%G4309><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> adoption as sons <S%G5206><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G846><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to the good pleasure <S%G2107><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>,

to <S%G1519><s%> the praise <S%G1868><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he freely bestowed <S%G5487><s%> on us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Beloved <S%G25><s%>:

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> our redemption <S%G629><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of our trespasses <S%G3900><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>,
which <S%G3739><s%> he made to abound <S%G4052><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prudence <S%G5428><s%>,

making known <S%G1107><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> good pleasure <S%G2107><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he purposed <S%G4388><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>

unto <S%G1519><s%> a dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of the times <S%G2540><s%>, to sum <S%G346><s%> up all things <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the <S%G5037><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>; in him, I say,

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we were made a heritage <S%G2820><s%>, having been foreordained <S%G4309><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the purpose <S%G4286><s%> of him who <S%G3588><s%> worketh <S%G1754><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the counsel <S%G1012><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>;

to the end that <S%G3588><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the praise <S%G1868><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, we who <S%G3588><s%> had before hoped <S%G4276><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, having heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>, the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>, â€” in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%>, having also <S%G2532><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%>, ye were sealed <S%G4972><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of promise <S%G1860><s%>,

which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> an earnest <S%G728><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> the redemption <S%G629><s%> of God <S%G4047><s%>'s own possession, unto <S%G1519><s%> the praise <S%G1868><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause I <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2504><s%>, having heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> which is among you <S%G2532><s%>, and the love <S%G26><s%> which ye show toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>,

cease <S%G3973><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to give thanks <S%G2168><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the Father <S%G3962><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%>, may give <S%G1325><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>;

having the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G1271><s%> enlightened <S%G1519><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> may know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> greatness <S%G3174><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> us-ward <S%G2248><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> that working <S%G1753><s%> of the strength <S%G2479><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> might <S%G2904><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> he wrought <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, when he raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made him <S%G846><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> his right hand <S%G1188><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavenly places <S%G2032><s%>,

far above <S%G5231><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> rule <S%G746><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2963><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> that is named <S%G3687><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things in subjection under <S%G5259><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to be head <S%G2776><s%> over <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to the church <S%G1577><s%>,

which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>, the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of him that <S%G3588><s%> filleth <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
